TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientTarget extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ClientTarget Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 定义与目标用户代理关联的别名，ASP.NET 服务器控件应呈现该用户代理的内容。

span.span: Defines the alias associated with the target user agent for which ASP.NET server controls should render content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引用在配置文件的节中添加的元素 `clientTarget` 。The class refers to elements that are added in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. 类属于包含 类和类的组 。The class belongs to a group that includes the class and the class. 类包含两个属性，用于标识客户端浏览器（也称为用户代理）。The class contains two properties identifying a client browser, also named user agent. 一个属性是与第二个属性标识的客户端浏览器关联的别名。One property is the alias associated with the client browser identified by the second property. ASP.NET 使用此信息在页中呈现服务器控件。ASP.NET uses this information to render server controls in a page. 有关如何以编程方式使用用户代理或其别名的信息，请参见 属性。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used programmatically, see the property. 有关如何以声明方式使用用户代理或其别名的信息，请参阅 [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used declaratively, see [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)). 如果 未设置该属性， 则与属性关联的对象将 反映客户端浏览器的功能。If the property is not set, the object that is associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. (它反映了浏览器类型的功能，但不一定是该浏览器的特定实例中的设置。 ) 如果设置了属性，将禁用客户端浏览器检测并使用与你定义的用户代理字符串关联的浏览器功能。(It reflects the capabilities of the browser type, but not necessarily the settings in a specific instance of that browser.) If the property is set, the client browser detection is disabled and the page uses browser capabilities that are associated with the user agent string that you define. 可将此属性设置为任何有效的用户代理字符串。You can set this property to any valid user agent string. ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式指定类的多个属性的值 。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二个示例演示如何 从配置文件中获取该对象。The second shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. 使用此对象可访问它所 包含的对象。You use this object to access the objects it contains. 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定类的多个属性的值 。The following code example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何 从配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Alias As String
public: property System::String ^ Alias { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 用于引用特定用户代理的名称。

span.span: The name used to refer to a specific user agent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用 `alias` `add` 配置文件的部分中元素的属性 `clientTarget` 。The property refers to the `alias` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 配置默认值包括以下别名：The ASP.NET configuration defaults include the following aliases: - `uplevel`，它指示 ASP.NET 发送 Internet Explorer 6.0 和更高版本支持的 HTML 和 ECMAScript。`uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send HTML and ECMAScript that is supported by Internet Explorer 6.0 and later versions. - `downlevel`，它告知 ASP.NET 将 HTML 和脚本限制为早于 Internet Explorer 6.0 的浏览器所支持的版本。`downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to the versions that are supported by browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 6.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserAgent As String
public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户代理的标识名称。

span.span: Gets the user agent's identification name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用 `userAgent` `add` 配置文件的部分中元素的属性 `clientTarget` 。The property refers to the `userAgent` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 配置默认值允许自定义各种 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本的页面。The ASP.NET configuration defaults allow customizing pages for various Microsoft Internet Explorer versions. 在其中，你会发现别名 `uplevel` ，该别名告诉 ASP.NET 发送 Internet explorer 4.0 和更高版本支持的客户端 HTML 和 ECMAScript，并 `downlevel` 通知 ASP.NET 将 HTML 和脚本限制为比 internet explorer 4.0 更早浏览器支持的版本。Among them you find the alias `uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send the client HTML and ECMAScript supported by Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, and `downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to that supported by earlier browsers than Internet Explorer 4.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#4)]
